extends Object
implements StackManipulation
    Loads the delegation method constant onto the stack.

      • DelegationMethod

        protected DelegationMethod(Implementation.SpecialMethodInvocation specialMethodInvocation,
                           boolean cached)
        Creates a new delegation method.
        参数:
        specialMethodInvocation - The special method invocation that represents the super method call.
        cached - true if the method constant should be cached.

    • 方法详细资料

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        从接口复制的说明: StackManipulation
        Determines if this stack manipulation is valid.
        指定者:
        isValid 在接口中 StackManipulation
        返回:
        If false, this manipulation cannot be applied and should throw an exception.

      • apply

        public StackManipulation.Size apply(MethodVisitor methodVisitor,
                                    Implementation.Context implementationContext)
        从接口复制的说明: StackManipulation
        Applies the stack manipulation that is described by this instance.
        指定者:
        apply 在接口中 StackManipulation
        参数:
        methodVisitor - The method visitor used to write the method implementation to.
        implementationContext - The context of the current implementation.
        返回:
        The changes to the size of the operand stack that are implied by this stack manipulation.
